changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE mapa_palmilha ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, sessao_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES sessao (id) ON DELETE CASCADE, sensor_idx SMALLINT NOT NULL CHECK (sensor_idx BETWEEN 1 AND 6), x_norm NUMERIC(4, 2) NOT NULL CHECK (x_norm BETWEEN 0 AND 1), y_norm NUMERIC(4, 2) NOT NULL CHECK (y_norm BETWEEN 0 AND 1) );
